welcome_message.help:
The message that sends when a user joins your server, only works if `welcome_message_channel` is set.
**Type:** String

welcome_message_channel.help:
The channel that receives a message when a user joins your server,
False means off, String means channel name, Integer means channel id.
**Type:** False/String/Integer

allow_invites_channel.help:
The channel that invites are allowed in,
False means off, String means channel name, Integer means channel id.
**Type:** False/String/Integer

prefix.help:
The prefix the bot will use in this server,
False means use default ($), and string means custom prefix (duh).
**Type:** False/String

birthday_announcement_channel.help:
The channel that receives a message when it's a users birthday,
False means off, String means channel name, Integer means channel id.
**Type:** False/String/Integer

birthday_announcement_message.help:
The message that sends when it's a users birthday, only works if `birthday_announcement_channel` is set.
**Type:** String

birthday_role.help:
The role that members get if it's their birthday,
False means off, String means role name, Integer means role id.
**Type:** False/String/Integer

qotd_channel.help:
The channel that question of the day questions are posted,
False means off, String means channel name, Integer means channel id.
**Type:** False/String/Integer

questions.help:
Question of the day questions.
**Type:** Array
